product_name: Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel - X Large
long_description: When wet, the extra-large Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel cools instantly to 30degF below average body temperature and stays cool for up to 2 hours. Get it wet, wring it out, and then snap it in the air to activate the towel's cooling properties. Patented Coolcore(TM) fabric absorbs moisture into the core where radiator-like fibers circulate water and regulate evaporation to create a prolonged cooling effect. The reusable and machine-washable Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel absorbs sweat when dry and offers UPF 50 sun protection.
short_description: When wet, the extra-large Mission Athletecare Endura Cool Towel cools instantly to 30degF below average body temperature and stays cool for up to 2 hours.
